Definition.WordDefinition: uninformative adj 1: not tending to inform or clarify; "an unenlightening comment" [syn: {unenlightening}, {uninstructive}] [ant: {enlightening}] 2: not informative or enlightening [syn: {uninstructive}] [ant: {instructive}] 3: not informative [syn: {uninstructive}] [ant: {informative}]
